question: After capturing Debal & Nirun, Muhammad-bin- Qasim marched towards which of the following?
explanation: After capturing Debal & Nirun, Muhammad-bin- Qasim marched towards Sehwan. It was a town which was under the charge of the cousin of Dahir named Bajhra. Bajhra was not able to defend the town in the face of the Arabian attack and fled away with panic.
